maithripala sirisena mahathage janadhipathiwarana uwamanawata mahinda rajapaksha mahatha bili ba gath bawa janatha wimukthi peramunu nayaka ana rajaye niladharinta saha polisiyata ranilgen paniwudayak handa saha asata penena darshanaya anuwa aanduwata bahutharaya nomathi bawata kathanayakawaraya kala pa්rakashaya sambandhayen parlimenthu raswi sammathawuwa yayi kiyana wishwasabhangaya gana kathanayakagen niwedanayak janatha wimukthi peramune nayaka anura kumara disanayaka wisin aanduwata erehiwa genena lada wishwasabhanga yojanawa parlimenthu ma "agamathiwaraya saha kabinat mandalaya pilibadawa kisidu wishwasayak na" jawipe wishwasabhangayata athsan kala manthriwaru menna!
